channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping in Oswin Street, 19th August
item.description:
Same old, same old!

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deliveroo bag attached to cycle parking stand, 19th August
item.description:
For the past couple of weeks, a Deliveroo rider has been leaving his bag attached to the cycle stand outside number 26 Alderney Street, when he is not using it. In practice, this is much of the day. Not only is this unsightly, as you can see from the photographs, it also prevents one side of the bike standard is attached to being used for cycle parking.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Problem tree at corner of Chirchyard Row & Brook Drive, 19th August
item.description:
Last time I reported this was on August 5th. Nothing has been done & more branches have fallen. It you look at the photo of the trees that have self seeded in Brook Drive you will see the black tarmac that was laid when they had to dig out all the roots of the previously self seeded trees. This will keep happening until the mature tree opposite is dealt with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elliott's Row, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large site used for parking vehicles and large amounts of fly tipping . It is opposite South Tottenham station., 19th August
item.description:
At the entrance is a foul smelling exposed drain ( covered by yellow plastic) Behind big gates is a lorry and large amounts of illegal fly tipping . My photos are an inadequate description of the size of the site.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durnford Street, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged paving slabs, 19th August
item.description:

item.title: Blocked pavement with person living in van surrounded by lots of rubbish, 19th August
item.description:
I’m not sure why this person is allowed to get away with living in a van on the pavement surrounded by rubbish . It smells awful. She has been there for years . Why ? The van and surrounding areas are crammed with rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stonebridge Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: VW Beetle, 19th August
item.description:
Gent has called to report a old vehicle that is located outside the garages on Weston Road. Gent is the owner of the property of where the vehicle is located and is in the process of removing the vehicle but needs a letter provided from the council to give him permission to move this. Gent will email over for further requests.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weston Road, Plaistow, London
